'''Flaming Flowers''' are objects found in [[Teyvat]]. Every 4.5 seconds, Flaming Flowers will deal '''300% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Pyro DMG}} around themselves. When hit by a {{Hydro}} or {{Cryo}} attack, they will be extinguished, allowing the player to harvest a {{Item|Flaming Flower Stamen|20}}.
